enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: The non-group discussed a non-paper proposed by its Chair.
Delegates were unclear whether the AGBM Chair's consolidated negotiating text remained the basis for negotiations.

A delegation indicated that agreement on an initial paragraph containing a reference to the advancement of commitments based on differentiated responsibilities and national priorities would be contingent upon outcomes in other areas.
A group of countries said that advancement of existing developing countries' commitments depends on the provision of financial resources and transfer of technology.
Some delegates pointed out the lack of progress in negotiations.
